name: Otto Matic (itch)
description:
Otto Matic was released in 2001 as a Mac exclusive by Pangea Software. This port was made under permission from Pangea Software, Inc. If you're interested in the technical stuff behind this game, visit Otto Matic's GitHub page!

Otto Matic © 2001 Pangea Software, Inc. Parts of this version are © 2021 Iliyas Jorio.
